alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Coastal Areas (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 21 at 1:02PM PST until January 21 at 2:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...All of Orange and San Diego Counties, the Inland Empire, the Apple and Lucerne Valleys, the Coachella Valley, and the San Bernardino and Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Periods of heavy rain will result in urban and road flooding in areas with poor drainage. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A moisture laden Pacific storm will move across Southern California Monday. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
